entries.text: There's been some discussion on P5P related to locked hashes, and whether they're worth the cost? A hash can be locked to a specific set of keys with the lock_keys function in Hash::Util. Do you use this for production code? If so, please let them know.

entries.text: Over the New Year, the majority of Perl employers in London decided they were voraciously hiring. At the same time, apparently, most Perl developers decided to scuttle — hermit-crab-like — away from the active job market.
entries.title: London-based Perl developer? Free £10,000 payrise (individual results may vary)

entries.text: The best thing — in my opinion, anyway — about working for a development team led by an active member of the London Perl community, is that you know management love Perl, support using the best available Perl tooling, and will create a technical environment where Perl developers will be happy.
entries.title: The only Perl job with a swimming pool; very exciting financial services company in London, The EU
